title: Ticket #5760: Set human-readable Docker container hostname
description:
User bug reports are now Mostly Useless because they claim the problem happened on host 6d536187a439 (randomly generated hostname for each docker instantiation).

Can we set the hostname within the container to something sane? Perhaps user-jid-slot-hostname ?
remarks:
2016-Jun-29 15:54:41 by gthain:
This name can only be seen from within the container, so presumably, the owner and job id are already known?

2016-Jun-29 21:26:06 by bbockelm:
Well, these are all pilot-based jobs: payload job users often don't know how to figure out the job ID.

We could probably deduce the job owner, given the job ID and the "real" hostname.
